BR_text.BRsummary: [Converter] Support dynamic cap negotiation between pause-start
BR_text.BRdescription:
Run a pipeline.
 Pause a piprline (e.g., stop button of pipeviz)
 Motify capsfilter before tensor_converter
 Restart the pipeline
 
 <denchmark-code>ERROR:/source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/gst/tensor_converter/tensor_converter.c:586:gst_tensor_converter_chain: assertion failed: (self->tensor_configured)
 Aborted (core dumped)
 ```
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text:
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/941>#941</denchmark-link>
 . The person in charge will reply soon.

comments_1.comment_text:
assertion in _chain() function, it doesn't get tensor info.
 maybe called gst_tensor_converter_change_state() and then resets configured tensor info.

comments_2.comment_text:
In tensor-converter gst_tensor_converter_parse_caps()
 Remove self->tensor_info = config.info; in the last.
 This line updates the property 'input-dim' and makes error when doing caps-negotiation.
 I will make a PR for this after changing nnstreamer directory structure.
